title: From Billie Eilish to The Rolling Stones, here’s what teens thought of One World - CBC.ca
description:

content:
The concert featured performances by Lizzo, Billie Eilish, Lady Gaga, Taylor Swift and more at their homes
Have you ever been to a concert featuring more than 70 artists, all from the comfort of your own home?
Move over Coachella, it’s time for Couch-ella.… [+4552 chars]
